event_text: m_c was grabbed by a hawk, but luckily r_r saves {PRONOUN/m_c/object}! The kit is still left injured from the ordeal.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred as a kit, when a hawk tried to carry {PRONOUN/m_c/object} off.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} wounds after a hawk tried to carry {PRONOUN/m_c/object} off.

event_text: m_c snuck out of camp and returned cold and shivering, frostbite nipping at {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} paws.

history_text.reg_death: m_c died after {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} got frostbite sneaking out of camp.
